DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore model suitable individualize diabetic management base mobile application coach demonstrate effect among diabetic mellitus population .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Smart Phone Application Individualized Management Chinese Diabetic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The enrolled patient randomly divide three group : group online self management , group online mutual management control group . The estimated sample size 78 patient group . All patient attend two follow-up visit hospital , 3 6 month . The data collect full-time recorder analyze use specific statistical software . The enumeration data analyze chi-square test , measurement data analyze one-way ANOVA .
DOC.criteria: Physician diagnosis DM 6 month ; Glycated hemoglobin equal 8 % within 3 month ; Age:1865 year . Insulin pump user ; Pregnant ; Active substance , alcohol , drug abuser ; Psychotic schizophrenic active care ; Severe hear visual impairment complication ; Drug user ( glucocorticoid thyroid hormone ) 3 month enrollment ; No smartphone access .
